name: GiggleWoods
description:
Summary:

You are the only hope for the lost souls of GiggleWoods. Sacrifice your own soul to free the others and release them from the Villoons that bind them.

A word of caution, you are not alone. Avoid the Giggler as long as you can...

Do not try to hide, there is nowhere to go...

Bug Tracking:

Click here to submit a bug via Google Forms.

Developer Note:

Please feel free to create let's plays to your heart's content! I only ask that you review the game and provide a link for your viewers in return. :)

P.S. I would love to see your reactions, comment or send me a link to your videos!
